sans.$description: Primary sans-serif font stack. Use for: all body text, UI labels.

heading.$value: 'Atkinson Hyperlegible Next', 'Atkinson Hyperlegible', 'Public Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
heading.$description: Heading/display font stack optimized for accessibility.

mono.$value: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New', monospace
mono.$description: Monospace font stack for code and technical content.

100.$description: Extra small font size (12px). MINIMUM readable size.

200.$description: Small font size (14px). Use for: secondary text, table content.

300.$description: Medium font size (16px). DEFAULT body text size.

400.$description: Large font size (18px). Use for: lead paragraphs.

500.$description: Extra large font size (20px). Use for: small headings.

600.$description: 2X large font size (22px). Use for: medium headings (h4).

700.$description: 3X large font size (26px). Use for: prominent headings (h3).

800.$description: 4X large font size (34px). Use for: major headings (h1-h2).

900.$description: 5X large font size (40px). Use for: hero display text.

light.$description: Light font weight (300). Use sparingly for: large display text.

regular.$description: Regular font weight (400). DEFAULT for all body text.

medium.$description: Medium font weight (500). Use for: subtle emphasis, navigation items.

semibold.$description: Semibold font weight (600). Use for: buttons, important labels.

bold.$description: Bold font weight (700). Use for: headings (h1-h3).

tight.$description: Tight line height (1.2 / 120%). Use for: large display headings.

snug.$description: Snug line height (1.35 / 135%). Use for: smaller headings.

normal.$description: Normal line height (1.5 / 150%). WCAG MINIMUM for body text.

relaxed.$description: Relaxed line height (1.65 / 165%). Use for: longer paragraphs.

loose.$description: Loose line height (1.8 / 180%). Use for: long-form prose.
